page.title: 04EXAMPLES OF HOUSES 1 DOUNE
page.content: Mrs Brown's house is a{modern flat which is 8 years old.There are 6 rooms in her flat which includes 3 bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, a bathroom. Mrs Brown likes the situation of her house as she looks on to the park and can hear the voices of young people playing. She has central heating which is under the floor. The garden is communal which means the flats are not very suitable for families with pets or children. Mrs Gallacher's house is a{modern {semi-detached council house}with 3 bedrooms, lounge, kitchen and bathroom. She likes the house apart from the glass front and back doors which slam in the through draught, and the warm air central heating system. The house is in a good place for the sun, especially the back garden.
